configurations.description: Enables experimental receive telemetry, which will cause consumers to start a new trace, with only a span link connecting it to the producer trace.
configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.messaging.experimental.receive-telemetry.enabled

configurations.description: A comma-separated list of header names to capture as span attributes.
configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.messaging.experimental.capture-headers

description: This instrumentation enables the generation of consumer messaging spans for Spring JMS.
name: spring-jms-2.0
